TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit GiveFeedbackEventArgs extends System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class GiveFeedbackEventArgs Inherits RoutedEventArgs
public ref class GiveFeedbackEventArgs sealed : System::Windows::RoutedEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启动拖放操作时发生该事件。The event occurs when a drag-and-drop operation is started. 事件允许拖动事件的源修改鼠标指针的外观，以便在拖放操作过程中为用户提供视觉反馈。The event enables the source of a drag event to modify the appearance of the mouse pointer to provide the user with visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，指示是否应该为关联的拖放操作使用默认光标反馈行为。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，鼠标光标会更改，以提供有关拖放操作过程中的允许操作的反馈。By default, the mouse cursor changes to provide feedback about permissible actions during a drag-and-drop operation.
